name: XWUI Date Picker Component
description: Date picker component with calendar popup. Allows users to select a single date through a calendar interface or text input. Supports date formatting, min/max date constraints, and calendar icon. Uses XWUIInput and XWUICalendar internally.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

format.description: Date format string for display and input

placeholder.description: Placeholder text for the input field

showCalendarIcon.description: Whether to show calendar icon in the input

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the date picker

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

value.description: Selected date value (Date object or string)
